short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free Powerful Chrome Extension: Find market intelligence and track hit products of Shopify stores in one step.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Shopify Spy Tool -- Terastore reveals Shopify store's secrets with just one click!
Try Terastore Now for FREE! 
With this extension, your browser will be 100% safe.
 
Main Features:
*Stores
Store level info and sales estimate - get the big picture in seconds
Best sellers and best new releases - learn the latest product trend in near real-time
Store level traffic analysis - keywords, search rank, clicks, CPC...all in one place
*Products
Product level info and sales estimate - gain product insights in near real-time
Reliable data for product research - a list of recently launched products including order quantities, price, SKU...
Easily sort, filter, and one-click download product insightful data with no limit.
*Social Media
Track all social media accounts in near real-time - such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Youtube, and Pinterest
Understand your competitorsâ€™ social media strategy and unlock new opportunities
Click on each social media logo for details
*Traffic
High level traffic analysis by geography and by sources.
Detailed traffic analysis in social media, affiliate network and keywords.
All traffic data updated monthly.
*Stores Listings
Create your favorites, keep tracking your competitors
Over 600,000 Shopify stores analyzed and counting - jump to the website with one click
Store distribution analysis by geography, products, GMV and category.
Detailed data analysis in products, estimated sales and traffic - view store name, domain, Alexa rank, sales...

Privacy Policy 
https://www.terastore.io/privacy-policy
For more information, please visit 
https://www.terastore.io/
long.en:
Stores
Quickly grasp the basic store information and sales overview to improve the efficiency of product selection
Quickly lock the top 50 hot-selling products and new products in the store, and provide product selection ideas
Display keyword search volume, ranking, click volume, percentage of paid clicks and click cost


Products
Quickly preview the order quantity, price, SKU quantity, and launch time of products on the current page
The basic information of commodities is updated in real time, and the estimated order quantity and sales are updated weekly
Customize sorting indicators, support one-click downloading of product information, and one-click jumping to the product details page


Social Media
One-click convenient view of competitors' main social media channels and their account influence
Click on the logo image of the social media account to jump to the account homepage to view the details
Refer to competing social media operation ideas to unlock independent stations + social media high-conversion channels


Traffic
Display the current store website traffic data, and quickly analyze the traffic distribution area and traffic source
Quickly obtain social media traffic, website referral traffic, and keyword traffic ratio
Traffic data is updated monthly, and the rate of change in referral traffic and search traffic is accurately presented


Shopify Stores
60W+shopify store data on-demand search, showing the list of the top 500 stores in monthly sales
Display store name, domain name, number of products, monthly sales, Alexa global ranking
Quickly view shopify's website area, product quantity, sales, category distribution
